pullrequest.title: quickstep split into quickstep and util

content.raw:
I have run some of the tests and they are working. There seems no space left on Jenkins, so the thorough test has not been done yet 

The `meda/gui/fonts/baemuk.txt` was added since I got a bug when I create the branch *quickstep_split_util* from **default**. 

The `quickstep.cpp` used to split was from branch **asme**, I would call it `asme_quickstep.cpp`

A good way to do code review is: 
Get a local copy of [quickstep.cpp](#!/osrf/gazebo/src/ee47fbc52c129b1b81e0e5a8165aee6219e44323/deps/opende/src/quickstep.cpp?at=asme) from the *asme* branch (since I didn't find a way to compare two files with different names in two different branches), 
and name it as `asme_quickstep.cpp`

[quickstep.cpp](https://bitbucket.org/rosebudflyaway/gazebo/src/52987a1bf810c3a25acbbbc906ba83923c1fd9e8/deps/opende/src/quickstep.cpp?at=quickstep_split_util) and [quickstep_util.cpp](https://bitbucket.org/rosebudflyaway/gazebo/src/52987a1bf810c3a25acbbbc906ba83923c1fd9e8/deps/opende/src/quickstep_util.cpp?at=quickstep_split_util) are from the *quickstep_split_util* branch

open two meld window, side by side:

The left meld window compares `asme_quickstep.cpp` and `quickstep.cpp`

The right meld window compares `asme_quickstep.cpp` and `quickstep_util.cpp`

It should be easier to review change in the code

@hsu  @scpeters
content.html:
I have run some of the tests and they are working. There seems no space left on Jenkins, so the thorough test has not been done yet

The meda/gui/fonts/baemuk.txt was added since I got a bug when I create the branch quickstep_split_util from default.

The quickstep.cpp used to split was from branch asme, I would call it asme_quickstep.cpp

A good way to do code review is: Get a local copy of quickstep.cpp from the asme branch (since I didn't find a way to compare two files with different names in two different branches), and name it as asme_quickstep.cpp

quickstep.cpp and quickstep_util.cpp are from the quickstep_split_util branch

open two meld window, side by side:

The left meld window compares asme_quickstep.cpp and quickstep.cpp

The right meld window compares asme_quickstep.cpp and quickstep_util.cpp

It should be easier to review change in the code

@hsu @scpeters
